member.name: P:sharpPDF.pdfPageMarker.pattern
member.summary: Marker's pattern. In the pattern there are two simbols: #n# (that represents the actual page) and #N# (that represents the number of pages). The Default pattern is : "Page #n# Of #N#"
member.example:
This example shows how to use the pattern property:
pdfPageMarker marker = new pdfPageMarker(400,30); marker.pattern = "Page #n#/#N#"; myDoc.pageMarker = marker ...... ......
The result on the document is : "Page 1/2"
